mapper.select: SELECT c.m_idx, c.item_no, c.cart_quantity, c.REGIDATE, i.item_name, i.brand, i.item_price, img.img_name FROM ITEM i JOIN CART c ON i.item_no = c.item_no JOIN ITEM_IMAGEFILE img ON i.item_no = img.item_no WHERE c.m_idx = #{m_idx} ORDER BY REGIDATE DESC

SELECT c.m_idx, c.item_no, c.cart_quantity, i.item_name, i.brand, i.item_price, img.img_name FROM ITEM i JOIN CART c ON i.item_no = c.item_no JOIN ITEM_IMAGEFILE img ON i.item_no = img.item_no WHERE m_idx = #{m_idx} AND c.item_no = #{item_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET cart_quantity = cart_quantity - 1 WHERE m_idx = #{m_idx} AND item_no = #{item_no}
